Package pl.polsl.model

Class Session

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.model.Session
public class Session extends Object
Represents a user session in the application.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Pawel Drzazga

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Session(String databaseName)
    Constructs a new user session with a database controller and admin user.

  • Constructor Details

    • Session

      public Session(String databaseName) throws ModelException
      Constructs a new user session with a database controller and admin user.
      Parameters:
      databaseName - The name of data base file.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there's an issue during session initialization, an exception may be thrown.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser() throws ModelException
      Gets the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The currently logged-in user.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there is no user logged in, an exception with error code 10 is thrown.

    • getSessionAdmin

      public AdminUser getSessionAdmin()
      Gets the administrator user associated with the session.
      Returns:
      The administrator user.

    • logout

      public void logout() throws ModelException
      Logs out the currently logged-in user.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If there is no active session to log out of, an exception with error code 8 is thrown.

    • login

      public void login(String login, String password) throws ModelException
      Logs in a user with the provided login and password.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login.
      password - The user's password.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a previous session is still active or there are issues with the login process, an exception may be thrown.

    • signup

      public void signup(String login, String password) throws ModelException
      Signs up a new user with the provided login and password.
      Parameters:
      login - The new user's login.
      password - The new user's password.
      Throws:
      ModelException - If a previous session is still active or there are issues with the signup process, an exception may be thrown.

    • isLogged

      public boolean isLogged()
      Checks if a user is currently logged in.
      Returns:
      `true` if a user is logged in, `false` otherwise.
